channel.title: taskr on Rajath Ramakrishna
channel.description: Recent content in taskr on Rajath Ramakrishna

item.title: Taskr - the simplest task management app
item.description: I started off 2015 by making an Android app. I created a very simple todo list app called Taskr. This was mainly to brush up my Android skills and get my hands dirty while digging into Material Design.
